channel.title: may on it's my life
channel.description: Recent content in may on it's my life

item.title: Enjoying May in Madrid
item.description: As we say in Spanish, “nothing new under the sun”. We have sun, a lot. But also storms. We were still in that period when the weather is changing. Maybe it was because one of those changes that I got sick and I spent a Monday in bed while my classmates thought that I had a hangover. On Monday. I am still working on my assignments. Sometimes I wish I was studying an easier major at university so I could have more time for enjoying myself.
